name: SliverSafeArea
desc: A sliver that insets another sliver by sufficient padding to avoid intrusions by the operating system.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the left.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions at the top of the screen, typically the system status bar.

fields.name: right
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the right.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the bottom side of the screen.

fields.name: sliver
fields.desc: The sliver below this sliver in the tree.
